Washington, DC – U.S. Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer announced today that a World Trade Organization (WTO) panel has once again found in favor of the Un...

View Full Release

Issued on: April 8, 2019

Washington, DC – The World Trade Organization (WTO) has found repeatedly that European Union (EU) subsidies to Airbus have caused adverse effects to the United ...

View Full Release

Inaugural Meeting of the U.S.-Kenya Trade and Investment Working Group

Washington, D.C.—The United States and Kenya held the first meeting of the U.S.-Kenya Trade and Investment Working Group on April 3-8, 2019. The Working Group, established by President Donald J. T...

View Full Release

View Full Release

Best TV Shows

Best TV Shows[email protected]2018-08-18T19:40:07+00:00

So what are the Best TV Shows on now or ever?  You may have seen many lists.  Of course many TV shows been on one of those.  But what about the best TV shows that are no longer first run.  How about the best TV shows within a certain genre?  Or the best TV shows on each network?

Picking the Best TV Shows

This website is just as much about educating you, the reader, on picking the best TV shows for you as it is about making out own choices.  Here is how you might pick the best TV shows for your own lists:

Narrowing the Best TV shows field

Narrow your choices for top TV shows in many ways.  For example, a top ten listing let’s you choose a variety of series in different genres.  Then consider which of those few series are the best in each genre.  The best shows on TV need to be the top TV shows in the context of a person missing everything else.  That raises the stakes.  It means that you have to focus on the quality of many factors and narrow things down.  The best choice cut through the genres.  As you’ll see, the top TV shows are not necessarily the top TV shows on every list.

Best TV Series proven over time

A best TV show candidate that is not new must have stood the test of time..  There is an expectation that these choices will stand the test of time.  They should not fluctuate because the writing slips, actors change, or it tries to stay on too long.  Instead you need best TV shows that we can safely assume will be at the top for most or all of its running time.  This factor may affect some newer shows that might be on a top TV show list of some sort but not an overall best TV shows ever choice.

Best Shows on TV evidence

Our best shows on TV must be a little less subjectively chosen and a little more objectively chosen.  In other words, in raising the stakes to choose the top TV shows rely less on any personal preferences as far as genres, actors, or writers and make sure your choices are broad and has a little more science behind it.  After all, you are not at this page wondering what the writers of this blog like the most as far as the best shows on TV, but rather what a variety of critics and viewers have come to judge as the top TV show on now.

TV.com has a different look at this topic, with a thought-provoking listing of the most popular TV series.

Best Fall TV Shows

New Fall TV shows are incredibly important to the networks and that leads to a lot of hype.  Most of all, each network wants to “win” the season.  They pretty much know what their returning shows will do as far as viewership and advertising revenue, so the new series takes on an increased importance.  2018 is no different. Therefore, networks save their most promising series for the lineup of new fall TV shows. This is not a random choice but actually due to the fact that advertisers are willing to pay top dollar for positions with the best new fall TV shows.  This is when viewing audiences are highest.

The major networks as a whole, and each individual show, become more popular and therefore valuable if they hit the fall lineup right. Thus you can find some real gems in this season, if you know where to look. The problem for viewers each fall is that they usually have a bunch of returning favorites coming back.  There is no time to watch every single one of the best fall TV shows that look promising. And in recent years viewers have become frustrated.  They feel that they’ve come to really like some of the new fall shows only to see them cancelled. Therefore most viewers only want to only invest their time finding the best fall shows that have staying power.

The new shows this fall undoubtedly have a lot of promise.  Many viewers could find a few gems that they add to their list. Are you looking for a replacement for a series that ended or was cancelled?  Do you just want a new series in a new genre?  Or maybe you just don’t want to miss a great series.

Choosing the Best TV Shows this Fall

How can you choose which new shows this fall to include?  Take four steps:

Previews of new fall shows

Screen “direct” information about each potential each of the new fall TV shows.  This may include previews and clips that are made available to information about the plots. Factors that have made prior new fall TV shows successful are important.  This includes certain formulas that have been known to capture an interested audience. Also look quite directly at the content.  Was it funny if meant to be funny, intriguing if it is a mystery, etc. We look for signs that the early plot lines might not hold up.  Will the new fall TV series in question will end up losing steam after a promising debut?

Critical review of the best new fall TV shows

Screen the reviews of critics you find trustworthy.  This includes those who have had success picking the new fall shows that have been hits before. Certain people are great at choosing wisely among the best new fall TV shows.  Know which critics to screen out.  For example those who tend to be overly positive or who seem to always promote a certain network.  Believe that it is okay to wonder whether your own opinions about the new series is at least reasonably matched by other critics examining the new fall shows.

Actors and Producers for new shows this fall

Consider the actors and producers involved in each of the new fall TV shows. Past success on television or the movies, but also the fit between the actor and the part they will be playing is important.  Look for producers who seem to associate themselves only with new fall TV shows that have been successful. Most actors and producers will not attach themselves to a new fall show without careful consideration of the likely success.  This is particularly true of those who we feel have lots of other potential projects they could choose from.

New Fall TV Shows slot and competition

To a lessor degree we consider the new fall show’s time slot in the fall lineup. Time slot gives up two pieces of helpful information. First, it gives you an idea of the network’s confidence in the new fall show.  Did they give it a prized time in the most sought after Thursday fall TV lineup?  Or is it already pegged for the less desirable Friday – or worse Saturday – fall TV lineup? Second, judge the place the new fall TV show got against our own judgement of the audience it is after. Regardless of what the network thinks, will the new fall TV series sit at a time when it’s hoped for audience tends to watch, and does it conflict with something else they like.

Also look toward the competition the new program will have against the other new TV shows this fall. Fans of a certain genre may be willing to watch any number of new fall shows that follow that course.  However, if the plot lines and overall show type are too similar they may begin to choose among them for their favorite.

In conclusion, we hope you find our blog and website helpful in finding the best new fall TV shows.  Most of all, we invite you to use the comments section when you agree, disagree, or want to add to what people are saying about the best new fall shows!

Ways to Choose the Best Returning TV Shows

Some of the best new television shows start off with a bang.  They are heavily promoted and quickly develop a following.  Yet others of what will turn out to be some of the best new shows on TV have not been able to gather a large audience for a variety of reasons.  It may take a little while.  Some top rated TV shows don’t immediately make it big.  (See the history of one of the best new TV shows of its time “The Office” for a great example).

In general, however, most of the top new TV shows get noticed by both critics and viewers.  Viewers may be looking to expand their horizons as far as the series they watch.  They may be looking for a replacement when a show ends.  Perhaps they are looking for a summer replacement to catch up on when other series go on hiatus.  Many want to know about lesser known high quality series.

First we want to introduce this topic by going over some reasons that some best new TV shows do not get much notoriety or a solid viewership at first:

Best new TV shows need time

Sometimes it’s just a matter of time before a series gets truly noticed.  Perhaps because the critics were not huge fans but the audience will be.  There are certainly times when even the best new TV shows don’t immediately earn a strong critical following but the viewers love it.

Top New TV Shows need a good time slot

Some of the best new television shows were initially hampered because either there were too many other series just like it at first.  That may have crowded it out of notice.  Maybe the network had so many questions about it that the put it in an unfavorable time slot.  In these cases a change in where the show is placed, or the movement of other series can do the trick.

Best New Shows on TV get better

Sometimes a series just truly gets better.  Maybe it was just the pilot and an episode or two afterwards that failed to get viewers’ attention.  Perhaps over a whole season a promising series that ends up being a best new TV shows possibility may improve with better writing or new characters.

Conclusions – Best TV Shows

We hope that this website goes further than the many sites that present top 10 lists, critical opinions about TV shows, and other types of listings and reviews.  Our goal here is to help you learn that best way to pick the best new TV shows and Top returning TV shows for you.
